content: The current time and date is Wed Jun 21 14:35:51 2023

I then read the file and received the same updated message about exploring the world through hiking, camping, and kayaking and documenting these adventures through writing and photography. I also tried listing files and reading the "adventures.txt" file multiple times, but the message remained the same.
